name: When I was little
description:
We all remember that time when we were little and scared. We didn't know what monsters were lurking in the dark. In When I was little, you play as a little girl, who has faced her own inner monsters. The goal of the game is to stay hidden from the monsters and solve puzzles to escape the nightmare. 

Controls: 

  1. A: Move left
  2. D: Move right
  3. W: When on string or robe you will move up;
  4. S: When on string or robe you will move down;
  5. Space: Jump
  6. E: Interact with objects
